idea: IndieFolio is India's largest network for creative professionals. IndieFolio makes design & design services more accessible for Indian businesses & consumers. Discoverability of the right creative professionals is a painstaking time-consuming affair for professional and individual needs and is largely based on referrals. By focusing on opportunities and other properties such as content and events, we have grown to over 50,000 registered creative professionals and are the largest such platform in India.
name: INDIEFOLIO NETWORK PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Smart Contracts Management for Smart Business with AI and SME
name: SettleFirst

idea:
we are selling, sharing and renting electric vehicle business.

all we want to do is manufacture good quality electric vehicles, and sale or share or rent it as we think sharing has more power to bring many electric vehicles on road because customer do not have to pay for whole vehicle but has to pay only for his/her ride. Due to sharing the utilization of electric vehicles will increase, also we dont have to wait for a product to get sold which would otherwise lead to less number of electric vehicles on road  and on a single electric vehicle many user can ride than that of the sold electric vehicle where rider is one or owner is one.

we are developing a software and there is one product unique in our design that can be patent that we understood after applying for extensive patent search.
name: LEKEAMP MOBILITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Lavina Rodrigues is a Interior Designer and founder of this Company.
Our Earlier company works at multiple scales and with various organizations right from private clients to corporates & defence sectors. This allows them to experiment and diversify master planning, architectural & interior projects, such as luxury villas, high end residences and unique offices as well as hospitality & institutional projects.
Our design approach is to re-connect  designs with nature, make optimum use of space,  natural materials, lighting & landscape to reinvent and transfor living environments and urban spaces.
We  strive to create designs that inspire, approaching each project, regardless of size & scale, with an understanding that interiors has a unique power to influence lifestyle and society.
Our forte is attention to details and customization. Honesty to design, client satisfaction, and sustainability are the driving forces alongwith the ability to constantly explore & evolve.
Having gained experience of designing various spaces for different levels of people, we understood the need for good homes alongiwth it being low cost.

So our company Pyra Build & designs have worked on a product, which solves the accomodation problem as well as being aesthically appealing to the masses who desire to own their own home in the city which is affordable to them.
We are dedicated to unique design approaches adapted to each project and achieving a balance between functionality & aesthetics, context, climate, material cost & time frame.
name: PYRA BUILD AND DESIGNS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Rugvediya Laboratories (OPC) Private Limited aims at being a clinical establishment, with an aim to make available to the people, high quality diagnostic services at affordable prices. The Laboratory (as in the title) shall aim at providing services directly or indirectly to patients and / or organizations and / or other establishments for improving the diagnostics and in turn improving the general Healthcare system in India. Rugved Laboratories aims to endorse a fine blend of Research activities to synergize with diagnostics for a comprehensive and progressive advancement in Healthcare.
name: RUGVEDIYA LABORATORIES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The objective of this project is to propose a real time capturing system for consumer supplies using Quick Response (QR) code &nfc in a smart phone.
name: SHAPOTAL

idea: nuAg Precision assembles farm data(Area, Soil type, Crop type) and integrates it with weather, satellite imagery data.Leverages Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Algorithms for predictive analysis. It captures minuscule details and provides integrated dashboard view enabling persistent farm monitoring.It also provides water budgeting mechanism to enhance crop growth and yield
name: NUAG PRECISION PRIVATE LIMITED
